Text: Controller freezes up after 5 mins of play no matter what setting it's in, using usb loader GX could just be me though but I say waste of time

The game in general is a waste of time, but meh.

I didn't observe any issues. If anyone has any issues running this file, please list what load method you used. It should work flawlessly on a proper set up.
PS: I used CFG Loader from a thumbdrive and a DVD-R (System 4.3U), both worked fine.
